CustomField.description: Adding a Text Area as Record Ids are 18 characters long x 20 Record Types and comma-delimited. When null it signifies that ALL have been selected.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Adding a Text Area as Record Ids are 18 characters long x 20 Record Types and comma-delimited. When null it signifies that ALL have been selected.
CustomField.label: Filtered Pay Transactions
